alert.note: Alert for Southeast Johnson County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 2:15PM MST until January 11 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM TUESDAY TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Southeast Johnson County. * WHEN...From 11 PM Tuesday to 11 AM MST Wednesday. The heaviest snow is expected between 3 AM and 10 AM. * IMPACTS...Mainly to travel, as roads could be hazardous, especially during the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall around 5 inches is possible across the southern end of the county, which includes Linch and I-25 south of milepost 250.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
